Tallahassee.WQTL:
WQTL (106.1 FM, "The Sound") is a classic rock/adult album alternative hybrid music formatted radio station in Tallahassee, Florida, USA, owned by Adams Radio Group. Its studios are located in northeast Tallahassee, and its transmitter is located due north of downtown Tallahassee.
From 2009 until April 2, 2012, WQTL aired an oldies/classic hits format as "Q106.1." On April 2, WQTL's oldies format was dropped and the station began stunting with music by The Beatles.
